title: Man arrested in connection with shooting of 5-year-old boy
content:
OKLAHOMA CITY —
Police have arrested a man in connection with the shooting of a 5-year-old boy, officials said.
Maurice Bowens, 33, was arrested overnight on numerous complaints, including assault and battery with a deadly weapon and possession of a firearm after a former conviction of a felony.
Authorities were searching for Bowens after he reportedly fired into a vehicle occupied by a woman and her 5-year-old son Tuesday evening at the Heritage Ridge Apartments, near Northwest 10th Street and North Rockwell Avenue. The boy was taken to an area hospital with a gunshot wound and is expected to be OK.
The shooting happened after an argument between Bowens and his ex-girlfriend, police said.
